content: CFS-T SBF Transit frame Transit frame to hold firestop modules for sealing cable/pipe penetrations through concrete, masonry and steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Cable transit frames and penetration sealing systems- ### FEATURES:Features Modular firestop solution – Hilti Cable Transit systems are a quicker-to-install, adaptable and re-usable seal for cable and pipe penetrations Versatile fastening options – these cable transits can be welded to steel or fastened to concrete using HUS screw anchors Hot-dip galvanized – suitable for sealing penetrations in moderately corrosive environments Approved for onshore use as a cable penetration seal Applications Creating a fire-, gas- and water-resistant seal around cables/pipes in concrete, masonry or steel Firestop for onshore industrial facilities – such as oil and gas installations ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Standard Technical Data | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 2280325 -
